channel.title: Possible to use two different Tor browser profiles?
channel.description: Is it possible to create a second profile for tor browser? I want to use the second profile for ssh tunneling with different setup for socks proxy and port.

item.title: Possible to use two different Tor browser profiles?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Simon707

Absolutely! Users can create additional Tor Browser profiles. The following thread discusses this topic. I would suggest reading through the entire post if you have the time.

https://forums.whonix.org/t/tor-browser-tbb-profile-with-custom-about-config-settings/4888

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to use two different Tor browser profiles?
